short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimizes stickers in Facebook Messenger chats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You don't like those humongous Facebook stickers? 
You have a special "love" for that thumbs up button? 
Suffer no longer. 

Note: this is a personal open source project born from a trivial but daily annoyance.
Feel free to contribute at https://github.com/Radu-Filip/StickersMinimizer
